Title: Irresistible Pool Pony
Description:
I've got a plan and you're the only one that I know crazy enough to pull it off!

I need you to take this irresistible pool pony to the Vashj'elan Spawning Pool and inflate it. Then, swim down to their hatchlings with it on. I'll bet anything that the hatchlings can be lured away to follow you.

Bring them back here and we'll proceed with the next phase of the plan.
ObjectivesText: Use the Irresistible Pool Pony to lure 12 Naga Hatchlings.
RewardText: Oh, they're so cute! I wish that we could turn them into little plush toys and sell them for a gazillion macaroons!
